articles.title: Maharashtra Finally Gets Ministers, 18 MLAs Take Oath
articles.description: Five MLAs from the BJP and four from the Shiv Sena faction led by Eknath Shinde will be sworn in at the much awaited cabinet expansion in Maharashtra today, according to sources.
